template.name: zfs
template.description: monitoring zpools and zfs filesystems for linux: https://zfsonlinux.org/

item_prototype.name: zfs $1 available
item_prototype.description: zfs amount of space available on dataset and it's descendents see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zfs $1 refer
item_prototype.description: zfs amount of data that is accessible by this dataset, which may or may not be shared by other datasets in the pool see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zfs $1 usedbychildren
item_prototype.description: zfs amount of space used by children see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zfs $1 usedbysnapshots
item_prototype.description: zfs amount of space used by snapshots see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zfs $1 used
item_prototype.description: zfs amount of space used by dataset and it's descendents see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zvol $1 avail
item_prototype.description: zvol available data for volume see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zvol $1 frefer
item_prototype.description: zvol refer by volume see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zvol $1 used by children
item_prototype.description: zvol used by children for volume see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zvol $1 usedbysnaphshots
item_prototype.description: zvol usedbysnapshots for volume see 'man zfs'

item_prototype.name: zvol $1 used
item_prototype.description: zvol used by volume see 'man zfs'
